h2.div: The Lunenburg Public Schools will be closed Until May 4th, 2020 due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OwsYgb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

ul.li: Beginning April 7th student should be checking Google Classroom for classwork

li.a: In-Home Strategies for Time Away from School
Lunenburg GSuite for Education Account Guide

ul.li: If a school issued Chromebook requires repair, you must schedule an appointment to drop it off at TCP. Use this link to schedule an appointment

li.a: Scanning to Google Drive from Your Phone

div.p: Teacher and Staff Resources - please use your teacher, staff or administrator Google account to access

li.a: Massachusetts Information on the Outbreak of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19)
3/19 UPDATE-COMCAST Increases Access to and Speed of Internet Essentials

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: District COVID-19 Information for Students & Families:

li.a: COVID-19 Letter to Staff,Students & Families-April Vacation

strong.u: COVID-19 and Special Education: What LPS Families Need to Know

ul.li: Comcast COVID-19 Free Internet Access Information (April 7)

li.a: COVID-19 Letter to Families 4-3-20 Remote Learning
COVID-19 letter to Families, Students & Staff (March 25)

ul.li: Worcester County Superintendents Association - Closing Letter (March 13)

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Mission of the Lunenburg Public Schools is to provide all students with the skills, confidence, and passion for life-long learning so that they may find their own paths to successful careers, active citizenship, and rewarding lives.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Welcome | About the District | Budget | Calendars | Community | Contact | Curriculum | Directory of Staff | District News & Information | District Offices & Programs | Extended Day & Early Learning Center | Faculty & Staff Resources | Health & Wellness | Lunch/Food Services | Parent & Family Resources | School Committee | School Year Information | Special Services | Superintendent's Office | Stay Connected With Us

ul.li: The video can also be accessed at the Knights's Roundtable playlist on Lunenburg Public Access YouTube Channel

div.p: Massachusetts public schools are home to more than 70,000 educators who are the most important part of their students' education. Join us as we celebrate these educators' aMAzing work!

div.p: Follow Dr. Burnham on Twitter: DrBurnhamLPS@lps_dr
Use our new Stay Connected page to update student & family contact information, access grades, make online payments & learn about district news & information.

For returning students, in order to update registration forms or make payments on your child’s lunch account at the Revtrak webstore, you must have a Powerschool Parent Portal account. Please contact your child’s school to create/update your Parent Portal account username and password.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: If you need assistance with PowerSchool, please contact the person listed below for your child's grade/school:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OwsYgb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: 1025 Massachusetts Avenue
Lunenburg, MA 01462

img.alt: Drone image of new LMHS school building taken by Eric Vickery

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-wNfPc jXK9ad D2fZ2 wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Superintendent's Office is located in Room #12 on the main floor of the Thomas C. Passios building.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Welcome to the Lunenburg Public Schools website!

div.p: It is an honor and a privilege to serve the Lunenburg school community as Superintendent of Schools. I am confident that together we can achieve great things for the students of Lunenburg! I would encourage you to visit our website regularly to learn more about our district and each of our schools. If the information you seek is not available on the district or school website, please do contact the school or Superintendent’s Office.
Kate Burnham, Ed.D.
Superintendent of Schools

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Translate this site: 中文 | Español | Tiếng Việt | français | português
District | LHS | LMS | THES | Primary | Technology Quick Links

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Copyright 2018-2020 Lunenburg Public Schools | Accessibility | About the school websites | Webmaster Accessibility Resources | Website questions? Contact Pamela Vallee, LMHS Library Media Specialist

p.strong: For questions about student accounts and PowerSchool, please contact the Administrative Secretary for your child's school.

div.p: Please email pvallee@lunenburgonline.com to report inaccessible content or if you have questions or concerns about accessing information on this website. Complaint procedures and filing formal grievances under Section 504 can be found on our website accessibility page.
